name: X Factor
overview: Discover the official game of the cult program X-Factor, made by Fremantle, which is responsible for the discovery of Leona Lewis. Since the start of the show in England, where nearly half of the population watched the final, the program has become one of the most viewed in the world. Experience the atmosphere of the broadcasts, customize your own character, choose your category and become the new winner of X-Factor. Invite some friends and challenge them with your favorite songs.
